body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Christian Thompson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Christina Davis.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christina. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having an issue with the customer service at one zero zero twenty-four Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Christina. Could you provide me with the details of what happened?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I had to wait for over two hours for a simple oil change.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. How would you rate your overall satisfaction with the service on a scale from one to ten?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I would rate it a three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your feedback, Christina. We will address this with our team. Is there anything else you would like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Christina. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
